const level: string = 'Danger'
// ---cut---
console.log(level)

// @filename: a.ts
export const helloWorld: string = 'Hi'
// ---cut---
// @filename: b.ts
import { helloWorld } from './a'

console.log(helloWorld)

const level: string = 'Danger'
// ---cut-before---
console.log(level)
// ---cut-after---
console.log('This is not shown')

const level: string = 'Danger'
// ---cut-start---
console.log(level) // This is not shown.
// ---cut-end---
console.log('This is shown')
